crazyballrun.game.level

Class LevelEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.level.LevelEngine

  • public class LevelEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The LevelEngine undertakes the task to pre-load all available level-descriptions when the game starts. Later, when the game-settings have been specified via GUI (GUIEngine), the LevelEngine can load whole levels.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Level getCurrentLevel()
      Gets a reference to the current level.
      static LevelEngine getInstance()
      Provides access to the level engine.
      LevelDescription getLevelDescription(java.lang.String levelname)
      Gets the level description for a particular level.
      void initialize()
      Initializes the LevelEngine by loading all avaiable level descriptions and objects of the global resource-directory.
      void loadLevel(java.lang.String name)
      Loads the specified level and starts the game.
      LevelObject loadObject(java.lang.String name)
      Loads an object from the global object-directory.
      LevelObject loadObject(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String level)
      Loads an object for a particular level.

      • loadObject

        public LevelObject loadObject(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an object from the global object-directory.
        Parameters:
        name - object name
        Returns:
        reference to the object (or 'null' if it doesn't exist)

      • loadObject

        public LevelObject loadObject(java.lang.String name,

        Loads an object for a particular level.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the level object
        level - name of the level
        Returns:
        reference to the object (or 'null' if it doesn't exist)
